cast.overview: An ambitious lobbyist faces off against the powerful gun lobby in an attempt to pass gun control legislation.
cast.title: Miss Sloane

cast.overview: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible: "inception", the implantation of another person's idea into a target's subconscious.
cast.title: Inception

details.biography: Canadian actor based in Toronto who has appeared in such feature films as The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio opposite Julianne Moore and Woody Harrelson, and EuropaCorp's Miss Sloane, a behind-the-scenes look at lobbying in Washington D.C. starring Jessica Chastain and directed by John Madden. Television appearances include Flashpoint for CTV/CBS/Ion and ABC's Designated Survivor, though the actor is perhaps best known for his portrayal of the intense convict "Mark" on the Netflix/Rogers co-production Between.
details.name: Jack Murray
